idea:
We are a Startup company. Our core business activities are Supply and distribution of Grains ,Lentils,Cold Pressed oil, Marble, Granite, and Handicrafts in India and Abroad.
Our primary focus is to have a one-stop shop for the Grains and lentils, Indian Handicrafts and promote Indian Natural stones overseas.
Currently, we have only one office in Mumbai, Maharashtra and our Natural stones warehouse is at Udaipur, Rajasthan.

idea:
Skill Shalla Foundation is engaged in developing skill among students within 9yrs to 25 yrs. We initiated skill training with Local CBSE schools in Maharashtra, India and now expanding to other parts in India. The uniqueness of our program is, the delivery model (activity based and practical oriented). Our programs are intended to reflect a holistic development of students in the fields of leaderships, presentations skills, job readiness, business analytics, business strategy and developing entrepreneurial aptitudes.


We also conduct programs which could make NGOs, social development organisations and other like-minded institutions to be self-reliant both in terms of intellect resource wise and financial resources wise. 


Thus to bring in a change in the prevailing delivery models, we are committed to build a network of trained and certified trainers, who would transform the youth to be entrepreneur by choice. So we want to provide the trainers with modern; IT, ICT and IOT enabled environment. for this we need funding support.
name: SKILL SHALLA FOUNDATION
